version_description: Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Minor bug fixes and improvements
Redesigned look and user experience for Chase QuickPaySM. Now you can enroll and manage Chase QuickPay settings from the app.

• Chase QuickPay payments are now available within minutes between Chase and select banks.
• Search, sort and filter credit card transactions.
• Now pay or transfer funds without having to re-enter your password when you log on with Touch ID.
• Explore auto loans from your phone and apply to get financing before heading to the dealer.
• Explore your mortgage options right on your phone. Discover options to buy, refinance or tap into your home’s equity.
• Use 3D Touch to quickly access ATMs and Chase locations near you by pressing on the app icon.

• Introducing Zelle(SM). The new easy way to send and receive money between almost any U.S. bank. Now in the Chase Mobile® app. Chase QuickPay® is better together with Zelle(SM)
• New credit card view makes it easier to manage your account and monitor your activity
• Explore checking and savings account options. Compare accounts and discover resources to help you manage your everyday banking needs
• Explore home equity line of credit tools and options, and apply right from your phone

• Explore home equity line of credit tools and options, and apply right from your phone

• Introducing Zelle(SM). The new easy way to send and receive money between almost any U.S. bank. Now in the Chase Mobile® app. Chase QuickPay® is better together with Zelle(SM)
• New credit card view makes it easier to manage your account and monitor your activity
• Explore checking and savings account options. Compare accounts and discover resources to help you manage your everyday banking needs
• Explore home equity line of credit tools and options, and apply right from your phone

• Redesigned look and user experience for Bill Pay.
• Eligible customers can now earn rewards with Refer a Friend.

• Redesigned look and user experience for Bill Pay.
• Eligible customers can now earn rewards with Refer a Friend.
Users with eligible devices can now use Face ID to log on

• Now you can send a request to multiple friends to split a payment using Chase QuickPay with Zelle.
• Add your eligible Chase credit and debit cards to your Apple Wallet. It’s easy, secure and your card number is never shared.
• Request a new Chase credit or debit card if it was damaged or got lost.
• Stop payment on a check right from your phone.
• Change the due date for your Chase credit card payment.
• Manage your profile right from the app settings.
• Let us know when you travel to prevent blocks on your Chase cards, right from the app settings.
• See tax documents for your Chase deposit accounts and year-end statements for your Chase credit cards.

• Now you can send a request to multiple friends to split a payment using Chase QuickPay with Zelle.

• Now you can send a request to multiple friends to split a payment using Chase QuickPay® with Zelle®.
• Add your eligible Chase credit and debit cards to your Apple Wallet. It’s easy, secure and your card number is never shared.
• Request a new Chase credit or debit card if it was damaged or got lost.
• Stop payment on a check right from your phone.
• Change the due date for your Chase credit card payment.
• Manage your profile right from the app settings.
• Let us know when you travel to prevent blocks on your Chase cards, right from the app settings.
• See tax documents for your Chase deposit accounts and year-end statements for your Chase credit cards.

• New ‘Profile & Settings’ screen makes it easier to access alerts, messages, documents & settings.
• Conveniently set up and manage automatic payments for Chase credit cards.
• Add pay-from accounts from other banks to pay your Chase credit card bill.
• Eligible customers can add their accounts from other banks, and use them to transfer money to and from their Chase accounts.
• Send us feedback to help us improve the app.

• New ‘Profile & Settings’ screen makes it easier to access alerts, messages, documents & settings.
• Conveniently set up and manage automatic payments for Chase credit cards.
• Add pay-from accounts from other banks to pay your Chase credit card bill.
• Eligible customers can add their accounts from other banks, and use them to transfer money to and from their Chase accounts.
• Send us feedback to help us improve the app.

• Enroll in Bill Pay to pay your bills anytime, anywhere.
• Depositing a check? We’ve made it easier through auto capture.
• We’ve swapped logos for images on the dashboard to better match many of the cards you carry.
• New look and feel presented to Home Lending and Auto customers when viewing their account information.
• It's easier than ever before to view your combined investment total.
• Learning & Insights is a new educational hub that will help you on your investments.

•Use 3D Touch for shortcuts—a long press on the app icon takes you to deposit checks, send, and request & split money options.
•Merge your phone contacts, see when a friend’s enrolled in Zelle®, and use a one-click add for payees with Chase QuickPay®.
•Manage your debit card coverage and overdraft protection for eligible accounts.
•Streamline payment and transfer options for your checking and savings account.
•You can now invest with You Invest℠ by J.P. Morgan.

• Use 3D Touch for shortcuts—a long press on the app icon takes you to deposit checks, send, and request & split money options.
• Merge your phone contacts, see when a friend’s enrolled in Zelle®, and use a one-click add for payees with Chase QuickPay®.
• Manage your debit card coverage and overdraft protection for eligible accounts.
• Streamline payment and transfer options for your checking and savings account.
• You can now invest with You Invest℠ by J.P. Morgan.
• Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We're frequently updating the app in order to give you the best experience. Turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version.

This update includes:

[+] Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We’ve enhanced the Chase Mobile® app experience with new features that will allow our customers to do more in the app.

Now you can:

• See credit card benefits and reward details for select products.
• Check your escrow balance and activity to stay on top of your mortgage activity.
• Request payoff quotes for mortgages and auto loans.
• Get an auto lease purchase quote.

Keep in mind: Features are subject to customer eligibility.
Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We’ve enhanced the Chase Mobile® app experience with new features that will allow our customers to do more in the app. Please remember to turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version. Feature updates includes:

[+] Move account tiles to where you want them.
[+] Track your progress toward a new account opening bonus.
[+] Access your personal Chase Home Lending dashboard for ways to make the most of homeownership.
[+] Southwest® cardmembers can now see their rewards balance and card benefits.
[+] We’re giving you the ability to submit approvals for account to account transfers, ACH payments, bill pay, and wires.
[+] We’ve made it easier to start investing today with "New to Investing".

We're frequently updating the app in order to give you the best experience. Turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version.

This update includes:

[+] Minor bug fixes and improvements.
• Minor bug fixes and improvements.

• Earn statement credit by using Chase Offers with your eligible credit and debit cards.
• Give friends and family a Starbucks digital gift card.
• Conveniently split a bill with another person using Chase QuickPay® with Zelle®.
• Save time and never forget to pay what’s due by setting up a recurring Bill Pay payment plan.
• Manage activities on your credit and debit cards with easily accessible Account Services menus.
• Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We’re frequently updating the app in order to give you the best experience. Turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version.

iPhone

• Minor bug fixes and improvements.
• Review, upload and eSign application documents and connect with your home lending team to manage your application anytime, anywhere.

iPad

We’ve enhanced Chase Mobile® for iPad with a new look and feel. With this update you will see a redesigned experience and many new features including:
• Access alerts, messages, documents in the new Profile & Settings.
• Enroll in Bill Pay to pay your bills anytime & anywhere.
• Depositing a check? We’ve made it easier with the auto capture feature for Chase QuickDeposit®.
• Request a new Chase credit or debit card if yours was damaged or lost.
• Let us know when you travel to prevent blocks on your Chase cards, from your Profile & Settings menu.
• Earn statement credit by using Chase Offers with your eligible credit & debit cards.
• Start investing with You Invest℠ by J.P. Morgan.

We’ve enhanced the Chase Mobile® app experience with new features that will allow our customers to do more in the app. Please remember to turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version. Feature updates includes:
• Enjoy a more organized list of all of your profile and settings.
• Access statement summaries from Credit Card transaction activity.
• Freedom cardmembers can now activate their 5% quarterly cash back.
• United cardmembers can now view their rewards balance.
• Grow your savings automatically with Autosave.

We’re frequently updating the app in order to give you the best experience. Turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version.

We've enhanced the Chase Mobile® app experience with new features that will allow our customers to do more in the app.

Now you can:
• Edit spending categories for your credit card transactions.
• See new features in Snapshot including category spending, money coming in each month and a rewards summary.
• View multiple business accounts on a single dashboard.
• Find investments and check your stock watchlist from the investment dashboard.
• See benefits and rewards details for IHG® credit cards.
• View eligible prior year contributions to your IRA in the investment dashboard.

Keep in mind: Features are subject to customer eligibility.

We've enhanced the Chase Mobile® app experience with new features that will allow our customers to do more in the app.

Now you can:

• Manage your accounts with a new and improved home screen.
• Review your credit card rewards earning activity.
• Search and activate credit card benefits including Global Entry and TSA Precheck®, DoorDash®, Lyft® and more.
• Customize your Snapshot by choosing the accounts you’d like to see insights for.

Keep in mind: Features are subject to customer eligibility.
